title: Caleb Aperahama
text: Caleb Aperahama (born 11 July 1996 in <a href="New%20Zealand">New Zealand</a>) is a <a href="New%20Zealand">New Zealand</a> <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player who plays for in the <a href="National%20Provincial%20Championship%20%282006%E2%80%93present%29">National Provincial Championship</a>. His playing position is <a href="Lock%20%28rugby%20union%29">lock</a>.
